content.question: Gross domestic product is equal to which of the following?

choices.label: Total consumer spending on final goods
The total value of production of all firms
The sum of income paid to all the factors of production
The total value of production of domestic firms
The sum of values added of all foreign firms located domestically

content.answer: The sum of income paid to all the factors of production

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
